tasks.title: Elevation Plot Images Disappear During Navigation
tasks.description: Images in room-elevation disappear when navigating away and back during sync. Copy pattern from category-detail.page.ts (Structural Systems) which works correctly.

tasks.title: FDF Photos Not Syncing
tasks.description: FDF photos appear in sync queue but never sync. Clicking 'Sync Now' does nothing. Find and fix FDF photo sync handler.

tasks.title: FDF Captions Not Syncing
tasks.description: FDF captions stuck in queue. Depends on TASK-002 being fixed first.
